response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $15,000, while still allowing me to recover the investment and ensure a fair return. I am confident that this opportunity will prove to be mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 12500}
